official_title: A Pilot Study to Determine the Feasibility of a Couples' Oriented Intervention to Promote CPAP Adherence Among African American Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea
inclusion_criteria:
* Must have same bed partner(s) for at least 6 months.
* Must be at least 18 years of age
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Must be Proficient in speaking English
* Non-compliance to management of OSA
* Apnea hypopnea Index â‰¥ 15 events/hours
* Terminally ill
* Mentally incompetent
* unstable housing
* need for BPAP or VPAPPAP).
